text:
🍆🌽🌾Allotment Garden provides  elevated planter plots where gardening enthusiasts can have a chance to grow their own produce and ornamental plants.
🌿🦋It's a great way to be outdoors and getting physically active.
🐝🐛A great initiative to promote active healthy lifestyles away from the 4 walls, especially for the able seniors.
🌿The gardening planters plots can be ballotted for rental from NParks.
Check NParks website for details.
